articles.description: Senior Patrick Steeves scored 16 points with 12 rebounds for his first career double-double, Terry Nolan Jr. added 12 points with six assists and three steals, and George Washington beat Massachusetts 83-72 on Wednesday night to win its fifth straight...
articles.headline: George Washington downs UMass 83-72

articles.description: Vanderbilt guard Riley LaChance joins SEC Now to describe what his game-winning shot felt like and how the team's game plan has changed throughout the season.
articles.headline: LaChance's late three sinks Bulldogs

images.caption: Vanderbilt guard Riley LaChance joins SEC Now to describe what his game-winning shot felt like and how the team's game plan has changed throughout the season.
images.name: LaChance's late three sinks Bulldogs

articles.description: Stefan Kenic scored a career-high 19 points, Anthony Wright added 15 with 12 rebounds, and Cleveland State held off Detroit Mercy 75-72 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Cleveland St holds off Detroit 75-72 on Kenic's career night

articles.description: Grayson Allen scored 25 points and matched a career high with seven 3-pointers, helping No. 12 Duke beat Virginia Tech 74-52 on Wednesday night.
articles.headline: Allen, No. 12 Duke beat Virginia Tech 74-52 without Bagley

images.caption: Grayson Allen scores 25 points and goes 7-of-15 from deep to lead Duke to a 74-52 win over Virginia Tech.
images.name: Allen hot from downtown in Duke's win

articles.description: Wichita State coach Gregg Marshall said this has been the toughest February of his coaching career.
articles.headline: No. 19 Wichita State out for revenge vs. Temple

articles.description: The Blue Devils get two alley-oop dunks from Wendell Carter Jr. and Javin DeLaurier.
articles.headline: Duke turns the arena into lob city

images.caption: The Blue Devils get two alley-oop dunks from Wendell Carter Jr. and Javin DeLaurier.
images.name: Duke turns the arena into lob city
